name: Deprovision Inactive Users Detected in Saas Management
description: This workflow is triggered by a SaaS Management report generated for accounts with zero days of activity over 90 days from initial activation. This workflow will deprovision those accounts to reduce risk and license costs.

Get Accounts.description: This action identifies the appropriate account data for the listed accounts provided by the SaaS Management report.

Manage Accounts.description: This action deprovisions all accounts returned by the Get Accounts step to help eliminate risk and license costs for inactive accounts.

attributes.description: This workflow is triggered by a report generated from SaaS Management. Accounts with no activity over the last 90 days will be deprovisioned.
